mapper.select:
select
from fabric_material where MARK_STATUS='1' AND ID = #{id}
SELECT * FROM fabric_material WHERE MARK_STATUS = '1' AND ISSUED_STATUS ='1'

SELECT
FROM fabric_material where MARK_STATUS='1' AND(ISSUED_STATUS =1 OR ISSUED_STATUS=2 ) AND 1=1
AND DESIGNERS LIKE CONCAT('%',#{addDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
AND(DESIGNERS ='' OR DESIGNERS IS NULL)
AND DESIGNERS !=''
AND ADD_DATE LIKE CONCAT('%',#{addDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
AND(ADD_DATE ='' OR ADD_DATE IS NULL)
AND ADD_DATE !=''
AND WAVE LIKE CONCAT('%',#{wave,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
AND(WAVE ='' OR WAVE IS NULL)
AND WAVE !=''
AND CLOTHES_STYLE LIKE CONCAT('%',#{clothesStyle,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
AND(CLOTHES_STYLE ='' OR CLOTHES_STYLE IS NULL)
AND CLOTHES_STYLE !=''
AND NUMBER_ORDER LIKE CONCAT('%',#{numberOrder,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
AND(NUMBER_ORDER ='' OR NUMBER_ORDER IS NULL)
AND NUMBER_ORDER !=''
AND SUPPLIER LIKE CONCAT('%',#{supplier,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
AND(SUPPLIER ='' OR SUPPLIER IS NULL)
AND SUPPLIER !=''
AND FOUNDER LIKE CONCAT('%',#{founder,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
AND(FOUNDER ='' OR ADD_DATE IS NULL)
AND FOUNDER !=''
ORDER BY ISSUED_STATUS ASC LIMIT #{pageNow},#{pageSize}

SELECT COUNT(0) FROM fabric_material where MARK_STATUS='1' AND(ISSUED_STATUS =1 OR ISSUED_STATUS=2 ) AND 1=1
AND DESIGNERS LIKE CONCAT('%',#{designers,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
AND(DESIGNERS ='' OR DESIGNERS IS NULL)
AND DESIGNERS !=''
AND ADD_DATE LIKE CONCAT('%',#{addDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
AND(ADD_DATE ='' OR ADD_DATE IS NULL)
AND ADD_DATE !=''
AND WAVE LIKE CONCAT('%',#{wave,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
AND(WAVE ='' OR WAVE IS NULL)
AND WAVE !=''
AND CLOTHES_STYLE LIKE CONCAT('%',#{clothesStyle,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
AND(CLOTHES_STYLE ='' OR CLOTHES_STYLE IS NULL)
AND CLOTHES_STYLE !=''
AND NUMBER_ORDER LIKE CONCAT('%',#{numberOrder,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
AND(NUMBER_ORDER ='' OR NUMBER_ORDER IS NULL)
AND NUMBER_ORDER !=''
AND SUPPLIER LIKE CONCAT('%',#{supplier,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
AND(SUPPLIER ='' OR SUPPLIER IS NULL)
AND SUPPLIER !=''
AND FOUNDER LIKE CONCAT('%',#{founder,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
AND(FOUNDER ='' OR ADD_DATE IS NULL)
AND FOUNDER !=''

SELECT
FROM fabric_material where MARK_STATUS='1' AND 1=1
AND DESIGNERS LIKE CONCAT('%',#{designers,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
AND(DESIGNERS ='' OR DESIGNERS IS NULL)
AND DESIGNERS !=''
AND ADD_DATE LIKE CONCAT('%',#{addDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
AND(ADD_DATE ='' OR ADD_DATE IS NULL)
AND ADD_DATE !=''
AND WAVE LIKE CONCAT('%',#{wave,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
AND(WAVE ='' OR WAVE IS NULL)
AND WAVE !=''
AND CLOTHES_STYLE LIKE CONCAT('%',#{clothesStyle,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
AND(CLOTHES_STYLE ='' OR CLOTHES_STYLE IS NULL)
AND CLOTHES_STYLE !=''
AND NUMBER_ORDER LIKE CONCAT('%',#{numberOrder,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
AND(NUMBER_ORDER ='' OR NUMBER_ORDER IS NULL)
AND NUMBER_ORDER !=''
AND SUPPLIER LIKE CONCAT('%',#{supplier,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
AND(SUPPLIER ='' OR SUPPLIER IS NULL)
AND SUPPLIER !=''
AND FOUNDER LIKE CONCAT('%',#{founder,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
AND(FOUNDER ='' OR ADD_DATE IS NULL)
AND FOUNDER !=''
AND ISSUED_STATUS LIKE CONCAT('%',#{issuedStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
ORDER BY FIELD(ISSUED_STATUS, 3,0, 1, 2,5),CREATED_TIME DESC LIMIT #{pageNow},#{pageSize}
